long_description: Take the hassle out of loading your kayaks and canoes onto your vehicle with the load-assist Yakima Showboat 66. Slide-out roller system eases solo loading and lessens the chance of damaging boat or vehicle (up to 34 in. extension from rear crossbar). Roller bar is padded for kayak's protection. Showboat clamps directly onto Whispbar, round, square and most factory crossbars. The Yakima Showboat 66 includes a set of 66 in. crossbars that attach perpendicular to your factory rack or Yakima car rack system (saddles sold separately). Stainless-steel and brass hardware resists corrosion.
short_description: Take the hassle out of loading your kayaks and canoes onto your vehicle with the load-assist Yakima Showboat 66.
